summary.para: Specifies a UMS scheduler thread, UMS worker thread, or non-UMS thread. The function uses this structure.

remarks.para: If both IsUmsSchedulerThread and IsUmsWorkerThread are clear, the structure specifies a non-UMS thread.

summary.para: The UMS version. This member must be UMS_VERSION.
A bitfield that specifies a UMS scheduler thread. If IsUmsSchedulerThread is set, IsUmsWorkerThread must be clear.
A bitfield that specifies a UMS worker thread. If IsUmsWorkerThread is set, IsUmsSchedulerThread must be clear.
